text: RCN Televisión, also known as Canal RCN (Radio Cadena Nacional) is a Colombian television network, which began operations on March 23, 1967, is known for having broadcast Yo soy Betty, la fea. one of the most successful Colombian telenovelas. == Other websites == * Official Site * Noticias RCN * NTN24 News * TV Colombia * RCN Radio - Cadena Básica Category:1967 establishments Category:1960s establishments in Colombia Category:Colombian television networks
title: RCN Televisión
